title: GM 's research and development expenditures 2015 to 2019
summary: Overall Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars, of value 7.3 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Expenditures in billion U.S. dollars about 6.0 was reached at Year 2015
